field.name: summary
field.value: RailsFacility doesn't detect pre-existing controllers in the Kernel

field.name: description
field.value:
If you load your controllers before you load the RailsFacility the RailsFacility will not pickup the controller.
You can recreate this by: 1. Loading your controllers via the config file and loading the RailsFacility via code. 2. Loading your controllers via code before loading the RailsFacility via code.
This is because the RailsFacility does not search the Container for Controllers that may already exist.
You can work around this by adding the RailsFacility in the config file or by adding all of your controllers via code after adding the RailsFacility via code.
